root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 16-4-1, translated into en
root.data: Goal 16. Promote the emergence of peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, ensure access to justice for all and build, at all levels, effective, accountable and inclusive institutions16.4 By 2030, significantly reduce illicit financial flows and arms trafficking, step up recovery and return activities for stolen property and fight all forms of organized crime16.4.1 Total value of inward and outward illicit financial flows (in current United States dollars)category IIICategory III
